paper.title: Financial risk forecasting with nonlinear dynamics and support vector regression
paper.abstract: We propose a dynamical description of financial time series capable of making short-term prediction utilizing support vector regression on neighbourhood points. We include in our analysis estimation on the uncertainty by capturing the exogenous from historical prediction errors and adopting a probabilistic description of the prediction. Evidences from a series of backtesting using financial time series indicate that our model provides accurate description of real market data comparable with GARCH(1,1).

domain_result.justification: The paper focuses on forecasting financial risk using nonlinear dynamics and support vector regression, which is directly related to financial risk management. The mention of backtesting with financial time series and comparison with GARCH(1,1) further supports its application in risk management.
